Descending recursive algorithm:
ln(1000!) = 5912.128178
ln(2000!) = 13206.524351
ln(5000!) = 37591.143509

ln(1000!) = 5912.128178
ln(2000!) = 13206.524351
ln(5000!) = 37591.143509

ln(1000!) = 5912.128178
ln(2000!) = 13206.524351
ln(5000!) = 37591.143509
